titles.title: Look to the Lamb of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: If you from sin are longing to be free, Look to the Lamb of God; He, to redeem you, died on Calvary, Look to the Lamb of God.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Look to the Lamb of God, Look to the Lamb of God, For He alone is able to save you, Look to the Lamb of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When Satan tempts, and doubts and fears assail, Look to the Lamb of God; You in His strength shall over all prevail, Look to the Lamb of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Are you aweary, does the way seem long? Look to the Lamb of God; His love will cheer and fill your heart with song, Look to the Lamb of God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Fear not when shadows on your pathway fall, Look to the Lamb of God; In joy or sorrow Christ is all in all, Look to the Lamb of God.
